inclusion.criterion: obese, according to the IOTF criteria (Cole TJ et al., 2000)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: pubertal stage ≥ 3 according to the Tanner stage (Tanner et al., 1961)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum Zinc level in the range of normality or under the normal levels.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Adverse reactions to the product or component of the product (allergies…)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Genetic obesity (Prader Willi syndrome, Down syndrome), Metabolic obesity
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Chronic diseases, hepatic or gastroenterological diseases
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Supplementation with inositol-like products or supplements containing Zinc and Inositol.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has been experiencing vomiting, non-bloody diarrhea, abdominal pain, fever, chills and loss of appetite for the past 3 days. He ate a salad at a restaurant prior to his diarrhea onset.
